lines.name: Berek's Pass

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: (10-36)% increased Fire Damage
Adds (1-30) to (10-60) Cold Damage to Spells and Attacks
+(30-48) to maximum Energy Shield
30% increased Damage while Ignited
+(5000-6000) to Armour while Frozen

lines.flavourText:
"From Frost's ice-bound pass
Berek taunted and jeered
Until furious Flame scaled the mountain
Berek escaped through the thaw
And Frost's tortured moans."
- Berek and the Untamed

lines.name: Bear's Girdle

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (5-8) to (11-14) Physical Damage to Attacks
(20-30)% increased Stun Duration on Enemies
Nearby Enemies are Crushed while you have at least 25 Rage
Nearby Enemies are Crushed while you have least 25 Rage
(4-7)% increased Physical Damage per 10 Rage
+20 to Maximum Rage

lines.flavourText: Simple. Deadly. Unstoppable.

lines.name: Doedre's Tongue

explicitModifiers.text: +(20-28)% to all Elemental Resistances
(20-25)% chance to Freeze, Shock and Ignite
Cursed Enemies cannot inflict Elemental Ailments on You

lines.flavourText:
Maligaro did the cutting... at her request.
In the new void, a malevolent power emerged.

lines.name: Ventor's Gamble

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: +(1-72) to maximum Life
(1-10)% increased Quantity of Items found
(1-10)% reduced Quantity of Items found
(1-40)% reduced Rarity of Items found
(1-40)% increased Rarity of Items found
+(-30-60)% to Fire Resistance
+(-30-60)% to Cold Resistance
+(-30-60)% to Lightning Resistance

lines.flavourText:
In a blaze of glory,
An anomaly defying all odds
The "unkillable" beast met the divine
And Ventor met his latest trophy.

lines.name: Bisco's Leash

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: 5% increased Quantity of Items found
+(20-48)% to Cold Resistance
1% increased Rarity of Items found per 15 Rampage Kills
Rampage

lines.flavourText:
You were always there, by my side,
whether we sat or played.
Our friendship was a joyful ride,
I wish you could have stayed.

lines.flavourText: Strike true, strike hard, and leave no survivors to retaliate.

lines.name: Tavukai

lines.flavourText:
"Hyrri and her arrows broke the sacred code, damning herself. 
Kaom seized her sacrifice, and in doing so, seized victory." 
- Lavianga, Advisor to Kaom

lines.name: Voideye

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: +5 to Level of Socketed Gems

lines.flavourText: The darker the eye, the more diligent the watched.

lines.flavourText: Lightning lives in an endless circle.

(20-36)% increased Fire Damage
(20-36)% increased Cold Damage

lines.flavourText:
Within the heart of every man and woman
lies the soul of a ferocious beast.
If you cannot tame it, embrace it.

lines.flavourText: Rage is a big part of courage.

Where her mouth should have been
there was only a whirling, black void.

lines.flavourText: Let winter come. It will only make my fire burn brighter.

lines.flavourText: Be careful where you put your finger.

lines.name: Mark of Submission

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: Curse Enemies with Socketed Curse Gem on Hit
Curse Enemies with Socketed Hex Curse Gem on Hit

lines.flavourText:
So great was the thaumaturgy of a bloodpriest's mark,
that sacrifices soon welcomed their death.

lines.flavourText: An eye for an eye.

lines.flavourText:
"Some blows must be evaded. Some blows must be endured.
The trick is to tell them apart."
- Daresso, the Sword King

lines.flavourText:
"A bit short in the arm, are you? 
Then you'll be short of a head soon enough."
- Daresso the Daring

lines.flavourText:
Kaom's strength was rivaled only by
the great Meginord of the north.

lines.flavourText: He was a lot luckier before he lost this.

lines.flavourText:
"Berek hid from Storm's lightning wrath
In the embrace of oblivious Frost
Repelled by ice, blinded by blizzards
Storm raged in vain
While Berek slept."
- Berek and the Untamed

lines.flavourText:
"With Flame licking at his heels
Berek berated the clouds
Until vengeful Storm spewed forth his rains
And Berek held on tight
As Fire screamed and steamed
And fled."
- Berek and the Untamed

lines.flavourText:
When the axe finally fell, Seryl shared his pain,
and the last thought that flickered through his
fading mind was her broken, shattered scream.

lines.flavourText:
"Our warehouses are bursting. Our vaults are full.
But our minds are still hungry."
- Medici Perandus, Prefect to the Treasury

Ming slew Tranquillity
Took Chaos for his wife
And on Her immortal finger
He placed his Heart

lines.flavourText:
"Did we make this? Why do we have no record of it?
We were warned that there would be consequences..."
- Administrator Qotra

lines.name: Blackheart

implicitModifiers.text: Adds 1 to 4 Physical Damage to Attacks
Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: (5-6)% increased Global Physical Damage
Adds (1-18) to (3-30) Chaos Damage to Attacks
+(20-36) to maximum Life
Regenerate (2-15) Life per second
10% chance to Cause Monsters to Flee

lines.flavourText: Fear is highly infectious.

lines.name: Immortal Flesh

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: +(75-120) to maximum Life
Regenerate (66.7-420) Life per second
Regenerate (8-12) Mana per second
-(40-15)% to all Elemental Resistances
-(10-5)% to all maximum Resistances
-(55-40) Physical Damage taken from Attack Hits
(40-48)% increased Armour while not Ignited, Frozen or Shocked

lines.flavourText:
"She begged the Earth to spare her Son;
Out of love the Earth agreed.
To the other Elements she did not speak
And out of spite They plotted."
- Berek and the Untamed

lines.name: Kaom's Sign

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: Grants Level 10 Enduring Cry Skill
+(2-4) Life gained for each Enemy hit by your Attacks
0.4% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life
Gain (2-4) Life per Enemy Hit with Attacks
+(10-24) to Strength
+1 to Maximum Endurance Charges

lines.flavourText:
A token from the sea
A sign for Kaom
to lead his Karui to Wraeclast.

lines.name: Tear of Purity

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: Grants Level 10 Purity of Elements Skill
+(5-22) to all Attributes
+(20-40) to maximum Life
5% chance to Avoid Elemental Ailments
+(5-10)% to all Elemental Resistances

lines.flavourText:
A shimmering symbol of Purity, clear as water,
but I know better than most how quickly
Purity can succumb to Corruption.
How quickly water turns to blood.
- Victario, the People's Poet

lines.name: The Ephemeral Bond

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: (25-40)% increased Mana Regeneration Rate
+(15-25)% to all Elemental Resistances
+(30-40)% to Critical Strike Multiplier if you've gained a Power Charge Recently
(1-2) to (36-48) Lightning Damage per Power Charge
90% less Power Charge Duration

lines.flavourText:
For how little time they had together,
their love was all the more powerful.

lines.name: Bisco's Collar

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: (100-150)% increased Rarity of Items Dropped by Slain Magic Enemies
(35-100)% increased Quantity of Items Dropped by Slain Normal Enemies

lines.flavourText:
Friendship worth its weight in gold,
a treasure every day.
I thought together we'd grow old,
until fate pulled you away.

lines.name: Carnage Heart

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: +(20-48) to all Attributes
25% reduced maximum Energy Shield
25% reduced maximum Life
+(10-22)% to all Elemental Resistances
50% increased Recovery per second from Life Leech
(50-60)% increased total Recovery per second from Life Leech
(30-40)% increased Damage while Leeching
(1.2-2.38)% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life
Extra gore

lines.flavourText:
Forged from the blood of countless wars, 
its thirst has only begun.

lines.name: The Aylardex

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: +(30-60) to maximum Life
+(50-81) to maximum Mana
+1 to Maximum Power Charges
(10-12)% increased Mana Regeneration Rate per Power Charge
(80-100)% increased Power Charge Duration
1% of Damage is taken from Mana before Life per Power Charge
40% reduced Critical Strike Chance per Power Charge

lines.flavourText:
Shackled fires dance about;
Might within from force without.

lines.name: Dream Fragments

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: (20-24)% increased maximum Mana
(50-60)% increased Mana Regeneration Rate
+(30-48)% to Cold Resistance
Cannot be Chilled
Cannot be Frozen

lines.flavourText:
Doryani stumbled into a realm of madness
And awoke its Master.

lines.name: Praxis

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: +(30-72) to maximum Mana
Regenerate (3-7.2) Mana per second
-(9-4) to Total Mana Cost of Skills
(8-9)% of Damage taken Recouped as Mana
(8-9)% of Damage taken gained as Mana over 4 seconds when Hit

lines.flavourText:
The Thaumaturgical masters of the Eternal Empire,
as unpredictable and varied as they were,
all understood one thing:
Free thinking leads to free action.

lines.name: The Highwayman

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: (15-25)% increased Rarity of Items found
1% of Damage Leeched as Life
25% chance to Steal Power, Frenzy, and Endurance Charges on Hit
(5-12)% increased Movement Speed
0.5% of Damage Leeched as Life while you have at least 5 total Endurance, Frenzy and Power Charges
Steal Power, Frenzy, and Endurance Charges on Hit
Total Recovery per second from Life Leech is Doubled

lines.flavourText: Somebody does have to get hurt.

lines.name: Perandus Blazon

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: +(20-36) to all Attributes
(6-12)% increased Quantity of Items found
+(20-24)% to Fire Resistance
20% increased Flask Effect Duration
-2 Physical Damage taken from Attack Hits

lines.flavourText:
A large enough debt turns even a friend
into an enemy, and the Perandus family
had more debtors than anyone.

lines.name: Bated Breath

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: +(15-30) to Intelligence
10% increased Damage
+(20-36) to maximum Energy Shield
(20-24)% increased maximum Energy Shield
(50-60)% increased Energy Shield Recharge Rate

lines.flavourText: At knifepoint, a moment's hesitation means death.

lines.name: Karui Ward

explicitModifiers.text: +(20-36) to Strength
+(100-120) to Accuracy Rating
30% increased Projectile Speed
10% increased Movement Speed
30% increased Projectile Damage

lines.flavourText:
"Shoot first, ask no questions."
- Karui wisdom

lines.name: Natural Hierarchy

implicitModifiers.text: Grants Level 23 Purity of Ice Skill
Grants Level 21 Purity of Elements Skill
Grants Level 23 Purity of Fire Skill
Grants Level 23 Purity of Lightning Skill
0.5% of Cold Damage Leeched as Life
(20-24)% increased Elemental Damage with Attack Skills

You can apply an additional Curse
0.5% of Lightning Damage Leeched as Life

explicitModifiers.text: (10-15)% increased Global Physical Damage
(25-33)% increased Fire Damage
(20-25)% increased Cold Damage
(15-21)% increased Lightning Damage
(30-35)% increased Chaos Damage

lines.flavourText:
Just as the rat cowers before the dog
and the dog cowers before Man,
so too should we cower before the First Ones
and pray we never learn of what comes next.

lines.name: Essence Worm

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: +2 to Level of Socketed Aura Gems
Socketed Gems Reserve No Mana

Socketed Gems have no Reservation
Your Blessing Skills are Disabled
Socketed Gems have no Reservation

40% increased Reservation of Skills
(80-96)% reduced Reservation Efficiency of Skills

lines.flavourText:
"This thing is not a pet. It is a parasite that feeds on the very will of its host.
Like any part of nightmare, it has found a way to make its price... acceptable."
- Malachai the Soulless

lines.name: Gifts from Above

+5% Chance to Block Attack Damage while on Consecrated Ground

lines.flavourText: God blesses those who bless themselves.

lines.flavourText: Nothing is as vivid as the rage of battle

lines.flavourText: The light that reveals is the glare that blinds.

lines.flavourText: The soul still beats, even when the heart never did.
